class.name: StateInput
class.brief_description: A temporary object to extend and store data for initializing a [State] when it is activated.
class.description: During the transition checks of a [StateTransition], an object of [code]StateInput[/code] can be created and added to the transitions via [code]set_state_input[/code]. The object will be passed along to the activating State's [code]_can_activate[/code] and [code]_activate[/code] methods.

members.member: The state name that the state machine is transitioning from.
